airville.core

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • airville.core.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the Player within the game. A singleton Class.

      • getInstance

        public static Player getInstance()
        Returns an instance of the Player.
        Returns:

      • moveSupervisor

        public void moveSupervisor(Supervisor supervisor,
                           Counter counter)
        Moves a Supervisor from one Counter to another.
        Parameters:
        supervisor - The Supervisor that is being moved.
        counter - The Counter the Supervisor is being moved to.

      • increaseCountOf

        public void increaseCountOf(GamePieceType gamePieceType)
        Increases the count of resources the Player has. This is to keep track of the Players total resources so the game can be saved, quit, and then resumed without the Player having to restart.
        Parameters:
        gamePieceType - The type of game piece to add to the Player's count of.

      • addPoints

        public void addPoints(int points)
        Adds a specified number of points to the Player's total points.
        Parameters:
        points - The number of points to add to the Player's total.

      • removePoints

        public void removePoints(int points)
        Removes a number of points from the Player. This is used for buying items.
        Parameters:
        points - The points to remove from the Player's total.

      • removeDiamonds

        public void removeDiamonds(int diamonds)
        Removes a number of diamonds from the Player.
        Parameters:
        diamonds - The diamonds to remove from the Player.

      • addDiamond

        public void addDiamond()
        Adds a diamond to the Player's total.
